Author: BEDBulimic
Text: Do not despair my friend, you could offer a non-food centred date idea that’ll make the date more fun and interesting than a standard restaurant!  * hikes * putt putt / mini golf * iceskating / skating rink * marketplaces  * karaoke * bowling * movies * laser tag * chilling at the beach * ferry rides * zoo * wine and paint (you can diy it at home if you can’t find one locally) * museums / galleries / exhibitions * a play date at a local animal shelter (depends on the shelter)  I agree with ash_alah that coffee is good for first dates and light food, or activities like movies- you could bring your own popcorn or make cute snack packs of safe candy for you guys to enjoy!

Author: ash_alah
Text: If someone asked me for a food date id just suggest getting coffee instead? Coffee is safe for me so that would definitely work and i think getting coffee is a nice first date. Or just suggest going for a walk!!
